analysis.description:
crowdsaleContract.fallback (/unique_chucks/44/0x6b6dc333bb3e115fe75731ac60737a736b430467.sol#219-233) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(tokenWallet,msg.sender,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/44/0x6b6dc333bb3e115fe75731ac60737a736b430467.sol#231-232)

Reentrancy in crowdsaleContract.fallback (/unique_chucks/44/0x6b6dc333bb3e115fe75731ac60737a736b430467.sol#219-233):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount > remainingTokens() (/unique_chucks/44/0x6b6dc333bb3e115fe75731ac60737a736b430467.sol#224-230)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/44/0x6b6dc333bb3e115fe75731ac60737a736b430467.sol#230)

crowdsaleContract._getCurrentPeriod (/unique_chucks/44/0x6b6dc333bb3e115fe75731ac60737a736b430467.sol#297-316) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (periods[i].startTimestamp <= block.timestamp) && (periods[i].endTimestamp >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/44/0x6b6dc333bb3e115fe75731ac60737a736b430467.sol#311-315)
Parameter '_wallet' of crowdsaleContract.crowdsaleContract (/unique_chucks/44/0x6b6dc333bb3e115fe75731ac60737a736b430467.sol#202-203) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_token' of crowdsaleContract.crowdsaleContract (/unique_chucks/44/0x6b6dc333bb3e115fe75731ac60737a736b430467.sol#203) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_tokenWallet' of crowdsaleContract.crowdsaleContract (/unique_chucks/44/0x6b6dc333bb3e115fe75731ac60737a736b430467.sol#203-204) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_startTimestamp' of crowdsaleContract.addPeriod (/unique_chucks/44/0x6b6dc333bb3e115fe75731ac60737a736b430467.sol#239) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_endTimestamp' of crowdsaleContract.addPeriod (/unique_chucks/44/0x6b6dc333bb3e115fe75731ac60737a736b430467.sol#239-240) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_rate' of crowdsaleContract.addPeriod (/unique_chucks/44/0x6b6dc333bb3e115fe75731ac60737a736b430467.sol#240-243) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_weiAmount' of crowdsaleContract.getTokenAmount (/unique_chucks/44/0x6b6dc333bb3e115fe75731ac60737a736b430467.sol#281-282) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_eWallet' of cDeployer.deployCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/44/0x6b6dc333bb3e115fe75731ac60737a736b430467.sol) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_token' of cDeployer.deployCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/44/0x6b6dc333bb3e115fe75731ac60737a736b430467.sol) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_tWallet' of cDeployer.deployCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/44/0x6b6dc333bb3e115fe75731ac60737a736b430467.sol) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_maxToken' of cDeployer.deployCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/44/0x6b6dc333bb3e115fe75731ac60737a736b430467.sol) is not in mixedCase
